sp_billStatistic
procedureList.CreateString:
CREATE DEFINER=`jieLink`@`%` PROCEDURE `sp_billStatistic`(`beginTime` varchar(36),`endTime` varchar(36))
BEGIN 

	select @freeMoney := sum(AccountReceivable) from box_bill where ChargeType=2 and PayTime>=beginTime and PayTime<endTime;
	
	#打折金额:应收大于0，且不等于实收，使用商家优惠（最高收费已满或异常放行除外）
	select @discountMoney := sum(AccountReceivable) from box_bill
			where AccountReceivable>0 and AccountReceivable>ActualPaid and ChargeType<>3 and PayTime>=beginTime and PayTime<endTime;

	#未打折金额，应收大于0，且等于实收
	select @notDiscountMoney := sum(AccountReceivable) from box_bill
			where AccountReceivable>0 and AccountReceivable=ActualPaid and PayTime>=beginTime and PayTime<endTime;

	#异常放行金额=手动开闸（事件6）+软件开闸放行（‘非机动车放行’，‘特权车放行’，‘识别失败放行’，‘临时访客放行’，‘预约访客放行’）
	#+收费已满放行
  select @abnormalMoney := sum(AccountReceivable) from box_bill
			where PayTime>=beginTime and PayTime<endTime
			and ( EventType=6 or EventType=5 or EventType=14 or EventType=16 or EventType=18 or ChargeType=3 );

END

procedureList.Name: SP_DataTypeCheck
procedureList.CreateString:
CREATE DEFINER=`jieLink`@`%` PROCEDURE `SP_DataTypeCheck`(IN mytype VARCHAR(20))
BEGIN
	SELECT
		itemId,
		bizTimestamp
	FROM
		view_datatype
	WHERE
		type = mytype ;
	END

procedureList.CreateString:
CREATE DEFINER=`jieLink`@`%` PROCEDURE `SP_GeneratePlateNo`()
BEGIN 
DECLARE plateNo VARCHAR(10);
DECLARE platePrefix VARCHAR(10);
DECLARE prefix VARCHAR(10);
DECLARE newPlateNo VARCHAR(20);
set platePrefix = (SELECT valueText from sys_key_value_setting where KeyID='DefaultPlatePrefix' limit 1);
set prefix = SUBSTR(platePrefix,2);
set plateNo = (select concat((select(
	CASE
		WHEN
			 ceiling(rand()*25) % 2 = 0
			THEN ceiling(rand()*9)
			ELSE
(select(
 CASE
		WHEN
			(65+ceiling(rand()*25)) < 73
			THEN char(65+abs(ceiling(rand()*9)-2))
		WHEN
			(65+ceiling(rand()*25)) > 73 AND (65+ceiling(rand()*25)) < 79
			THEN char(73+abs(ceiling(rand()*9)-4))
		ELSE
			char(79+ceiling(rand()*11))
		END))
			END)),(select(
	CASE
		WHEN
			 ceiling(rand()*25) % 2 = 0
			THEN ceiling(rand()*9)
			ELSE
(select(
 CASE
		WHEN
			(65+ceiling(rand()*25)) < 73
			THEN char(65+abs(ceiling(rand()*9)-2))
		WHEN
			(65+ceiling(rand()*25)) > 73 AND (65+ceiling(rand()*25)) < 79
			THEN char(73+abs(ceiling(rand()*9)-4))
		ELSE
			char(79+ceiling(rand()*11))
		END))
			END)),(select(
	CASE
		WHEN
			 ceiling(rand()*25) % 2 = 0
			THEN ceiling(rand()*9)
			ELSE
(select(
 CASE
		WHEN
			(65+ceiling(rand()*25)) < 73
			THEN char(65+abs(ceiling(rand()*9)-2))
		WHEN
			(65+ceiling(rand()*25)) > 73 AND (65+ceiling(rand()*25)) < 79
			THEN char(73+abs(ceiling(rand()*9)-4))
		ELSE
			char(79+ceiling(rand()*11))
		END))
			END)),(select(
	CASE
		WHEN
			 ceiling(rand()*25) % 2 = 0
			THEN ceiling(rand()*9)
			ELSE
(select(
 CASE
		WHEN
			(65+ceiling(rand()*25)) < 73
			THEN char(65+abs(ceiling(rand()*9)-2))
		WHEN
			(65+ceiling(rand()*25)) > 73 AND (65+ceiling(rand()*25)) < 79
			THEN char(73+abs(ceiling(rand()*9)-4))
		ELSE
			char(79+ceiling(rand()*11))
		END))
			END)),(select(
	CASE
		WHEN
			 ceiling(rand()*25) % 2 = 0
			THEN ceiling(rand()*9)
			ELSE
(select(
 CASE
		WHEN
			(65+ceiling(rand()*25)) < 73
			THEN char(65+abs(ceiling(rand()*9)-2))
		WHEN
			(65+ceiling(rand()*25)) > 73 AND (65+ceiling(rand()*25)) < 79
			THEN char(73+abs(ceiling(rand()*9)-4))
		ELSE
			char(79+ceiling(rand()*11))
		END))
			END))));
set newPlateNo = REPLACE(concat('无',prefix,plateNo),'I','1');
SELECT newPlateNo;
 END

procedureList.Name: SP_GetCheckData
procedureList.CreateString:
CREATE DEFINER=`jieLink`@`%` PROCEDURE `SP_GetCheckData`(
in CheckDate Date
)
BEGIN
set @CheckDate := CheckDate;


 SELECT COUNT(1) INTO @totalParkOutNum
    FROM    box_out_record  
    WHERE   OutDeviceID > 0
            AND OutTime >= @CheckDate
            AND OutTime < DATE_ADD(DATE(@CheckDate),INTERVAL 1 DAY);

SELECT SUM(AccountReceivable) INTO @totalParkOutCharge
FROM box_out_record
WHERE  OutDeviceID > 0
            AND OutTime >= @CheckDate
            AND OutTime < DATE_ADD(DATE(@CheckDate),INTERVAL 1 DAY);

 SELECT  COUNT(1) INTO @parkOutNum
    FROM   box_out_record
    WHERE    OutDeviceID > 0
            AND UpLoadFlag = 1
             AND OutTime >= @CheckDate
             AND OutTime < DATE_ADD(DATE(@CheckDate),INTERVAL 1 DAY);

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(AccountReceivable),0) INTO @parkOutCharge
FROM box_out_record
WHERE  OutDeviceID > 0
            AND UpLoadFlag = 1
            AND OutTime >= @CheckDate 
            AND OutTime < DATE_ADD(DATE(@CheckDate),INTERVAL 1 DAY);
            
    SELECT COUNT(1) INTO @totalHandWorkNum
    FROM    box_out_record
    WHERE   OutDeviceID > 0
            AND EventType = 6
            AND OutTime >= @CheckDate
            AND OutTime < DATE_ADD(DATE(@CheckDate),INTERVAL 1 DAY);
                    
    SELECT COUNT(1) INTO @parkOutHandWorkNum
    FROM    box_out_record
    WHERE   OutDeviceID > 0
            AND UpLoadFlag = 1
            AND EventType = 6
             AND OutTime >= @CheckDate
             AND OutTime < DATE_ADD(DATE(@CheckDate),INTERVAL 1 DAY);


    SELECT   COUNT(1) INTO @totalCardIssueNum
    FROM    control_voucher
    WHERE   AddTime >= @CheckDate
            AND AddTime < DATE_ADD(DATE(@CheckDate),INTERVAL 1 DAY);
    SET @cardIssueNum=@totalCardIssueNum;

select  CheckDate,@totalParkOutNum as totalParkOutNum
      ,@totalParkOutCharge as totalParkOutCharge
      ,@parkOutNum as parkOutNum
      ,@parkOutCharge as parkOutCharge
      ,@totalHandWorkNum as totalHandWorkNum,@parkOutHandWorkNum as parkOutHandWorkNum
      ,@totalCardIssueNum as totalCardIssueNum,@cardIssueNum as cardIssueNum,1 as isPicture;           
 END

procedureList.Name: SP_UploadDataMonitor
procedureList.CreateString:
CREATE DEFINER=`jieLink`@`%` PROCEDURE `SP_UploadDataMonitor`(
in CheckDate DATE
)
BEGIN
set @CheckDate := CheckDate;
SELECT type,statType,total,success from (
-- 设备(全量)
  SELECT 'DEVICE' as type,2 as statType, COUNT(1) as total,COALESCE((SELECT count(DISTINCT BusinessId) from sync_park_base_history ht 
  WHERE ht.BusinessId  in (SELECT DGUID from control_devices  fr 
  INNER JOIN dic_detail dic on fr.DeviceType = dic.DicDetailId
  WHERE dic.NisspCode != '' and dic.DicTypeId =1000 and dic.NisspCode != '8888' and dic.NisspCode != '9999') and ServiceId='dm_equip_base_data_equipment'),0) as success from control_devices frt 
  INNER JOIN dic_detail dic on frt.DeviceType = dic.DicDetailId
  WHERE dic.NisspCode != '' and dic.DicTypeId =1000 and dic.NisspCode != '8888' and dic.NisspCode != '9999'
-- 人员(全量) 
	UNION
	SELECT 'PERSON' as type,2 as statType, COUNT(1) as total,COALESCE((SELECT count(DISTINCT BusinessId) from sync_park_base_history ht 
  WHERE ht.BusinessId in (SELECT PGUID from control_person where `Status` != 1) and ServiceId='dm_base_data_person'),0) as success from control_person frt 
  WHERE frt.`Status` != 1
-- 凭证（正常）(全量)
	UNION
	SELECT 'CARD_NORMAL' as type,2 as statType, COUNT(1) as total,COALESCE((SELECT count(DISTINCT BusinessId) from sync_park_base_history ht 
  WHERE ht.BusinessId in (SELECT Guid from control_voucher where `Status` = 1) and ServiceId='dm_card_voucherInfo'),0) as success from control_voucher frt
  WHERE frt.`Status` = 1
-- 服务（正常）(全量)
	UNION
	SELECT 'SERVICE_NORMAL' as type,2 as statType, COUNT(1) as total,COALESCE((SELECT count(DISTINCT BusinessId) from sync_park_base_history ht 
  WHERE ht.BusinessId in (SELECT NisspId from control_lease_stall where `Status` = 0)  and ServiceId='dm_card_data_serviceInfo'),0) as success 
  from control_lease_stall frt  WHERE frt.`Status` = 0
-- 人员设备关系(全量)
	UNION
	SELECT 'PERSON_DEVICE' as type,2 as statType, COUNT(1) as total,COALESCE((SELECT count(DISTINCT BusinessId) from sync_park_base_history ht 
  WHERE ht.BusinessId in (SELECT PDGUID from control_person_device) and ServiceId='dm_base_data_personpermission'),0) as success from control_person_device frt
-- 人员防区关系(全量)
	UNION
	SELECT 'PERSON_AREA' as type,2 as statType, COUNT(1) as total,COALESCE((SELECT count(DISTINCT BusinessId) from sync_park_base_history ht 
  WHERE ht.BusinessId in (SELECT PAGUID from control_person_area) and ServiceId='dm_base_data_personarea'),0) as success from control_person_area frt
-- 车辆信息(全量)
	UNION
	SELECT 'CAR' as type,2 as statType, COUNT(1) as total,COALESCE((SELECT count(DISTINCT BusinessId) from sync_park_base_history ht 
  WHERE ht.BusinessId in (SELECT VGUID from control_vehicle_info where `Status` != 2) and ServiceId='dm_park_base_data_car'),0) as success 
  from control_vehicle_info frt where frt.`Status` != 2
-- 临时卡收费标准(全量)
	UNION
	SELECT 'TEMP_CARD_STANDARD' as type,2 as statType, COUNT(1) as total,COALESCE((SELECT count(DISTINCT BusinessId) from sync_park_base_history ht 
  WHERE ht.BusinessId in (SELECT TGUID from charge_temp_standard where `Status` = 1) and ServiceId='dm_park_base_data_tempcardstandard'),0) as success 
  from charge_temp_standard frt where frt.`Status` = 1
-- 月卡收费标准(全量)
	UNION
	SELECT 'MONTH_CARD_STANDARD' as type,2 as statType, COUNT(1) as total,COALESCE((SELECT count(DISTINCT BusinessId) from sync_park_base_history ht 
  WHERE ht.BusinessId in (SELECT MGUID from finance_month_charge where `Status` = 0 and MonthNum >0 and MonthMoney > 0) and ServiceId='dm_park_base_data_monthcardstandard'),0) as success 
  from finance_month_charge frt where frt.`Status` = 0 and MonthNum >0 and MonthMoney > 0
-- 场内车辆(全量)
	UNION
	SELECT 'YARD_CAR' as type,2 as statType, COUNT(1) as total, COUNT(1) as success from box_enter_record frt
  where frt.WasGone = 0
-- 入场数据(增量)
	UNION
	SELECT 'IN_RECORD' as type,1 as statType, COUNT(1) as total,COALESCE((SELECT COUNT(EGUID) from box_enter_record where EnterTime >= @CheckDate 
  AND EnterTime < DATE_ADD(DATE(@CheckDate),INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND UpLoadFlag = 1),0) as success from box_enter_record frt
  where frt.EnterTime >= @CheckDate AND frt.EnterTime < DATE_ADD(DATE(@CheckDate),INTERVAL 1 DAY)
  -- 出场数据(增量)
	UNION
	SELECT 'OUT_RECORD' as type,1 as statType, COUNT(1) as total,COALESCE((SELECT COUNT(OGUID) from box_out_record 
  where OutTime >= @CheckDate AND OutTime < DATE_ADD(DATE(@CheckDate),INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND UpLoadFlag = 1),0) as success from box_out_record frt
  where frt.OutTime >= @CheckDate AND frt.OutTime < DATE_ADD(DATE(@CheckDate),INTERVAL 1 DAY)
-- 消费打折(增量)
	UNION
	SELECT 'DISCOUNT' as type,1 as statType, COUNT(1) as total,COALESCE((SELECT count(DISTINCT BusinessId) from sync_xmpp_history ht 
  WHERE ht.BusinessId in (SELECT NisspId from business_discount where `Way` = 0 AND DiscountTime >= @CheckDate AND DiscountTime < DATE_ADD(DATE(@CheckDate),INTERVAL 1 DAY)) 
  AND ServiceId='dm_park_discountNotify'),0) as success 
  from business_discount frt where frt.`Way` = 0 AND frt.DiscountTime >= @CheckDate AND frt.DiscountTime < DATE_ADD(DATE(@CheckDate),INTERVAL 1 DAY)
-- 车场黑名单(全量)
	UNION
	SELECT 'CAR_BLACK_SHEET' as type,2 as statType, COUNT(1) as total,COALESCE((SELECT count(DISTINCT BusinessId) from sync_park_base_history ht 
  WHERE ht.BusinessId in (SELECT BGUID from black_white_grey where `Status` = 0) and ServiceId='dm_park_base_data_carblacksheet'),0) as success 
  from black_white_grey frt where frt.`Status` = 0
-- 图片数据(增量)
	UNION
	SELECT 'PICTURE' as type,1 as statType, COUNT(1) as total,COUNT(1) as success from sync_xmpp_history 
  where ServiceId = 'dm_common_file_image' AND ServiceType = 0 AND AddTime >= @CheckDate AND AddTime < DATE_ADD(DATE(@CheckDate),INTERVAL 1 DAY)
-- 卡券打折记录(增量)
	UNION
	SELECT 'TICKET_RECORD' as type,1 as statType, COUNT(1) as total,COUNT(1) as success 
  from business_discount frt where frt.`Way` = 1 AND frt.DiscountTime >= @CheckDate AND frt.DiscountTime < DATE_ADD(DATE(@CheckDate),INTERVAL 1 DAY)
-- 未解锁车辆出场记录(全量)
	UNION
	SELECT 'UNLOCK_CAR_OUT' as type,2 as statType, COUNT(1) as total,COUNT(1) as success  from control_plate_lock frt where frt.`LockStatus` = 1 
-- 交易记录：月租车,线上--支付(全量)
	UNION
	SELECT 'MONTH_ONLINE_AMOUNT' as type,2 as statType, COUNT(1) as total,COALESCE((SELECT COUNT(1) from box_bill bill
  INNER JOIN sys_setmeal_type ml ON bill.SealTypeId = ml.SetNO
  WHERE ml.UserType = 1  and bill.OrderType = 1 and UpLoadFlag = 1),0) as success 
  from box_bill frt INNER JOIN sys_setmeal_type meal ON frt.SealTypeId = meal.SetNO
  WHERE meal.UserType = 1 and frt.OrderType = 1
-- 交易记录：月租车,线下--现金(全量)
	UNION
	SELECT 'MONTH_CASH_AMOUNT' as type,2 as statType, COUNT(1) as total,COALESCE((SELECT COUNT(1) from box_bill bill
  INNER JOIN sys_setmeal_type ml ON bill.SealTypeId = ml.SetNO
  WHERE ml.UserType = 1  and bill.PayTypeID =13 and bill.OrderType in (2,3,4) and UpLoadFlag = 1),0) as success 
  from box_bill frt INNER JOIN sys_setmeal_type meal ON frt.SealTypeId = meal.SetNO
  WHERE meal.UserType = 1 and frt.PayTypeID =13 and frt.OrderType in (2,3,4)
-- 交易记录：临时车,线上--代扣(全量)
	UNION
	SELECT 'TEMP_ONLINE_WITHHOLD_AMOUNT' as type,2 as statType, COUNT(1) as total,COALESCE((SELECT COUNT(1) from box_bill bill
  INNER JOIN sys_setmeal_type ml ON bill.SealTypeId = ml.SetNO
  WHERE ml.UserType = 2 and bill.ReplaceDeduct = 1 and UpLoadFlag = 1),0) as success 
  from box_bill frt INNER JOIN sys_setmeal_type meal ON frt.SealTypeId = meal.SetNO
  WHERE meal.UserType = 2 and frt.ReplaceDeduct = 1
-- 交易记录：临时车,线上--主动付(全量)
	UNION
	SELECT 'TEMP_ONLINE_INITIATIVE_AMOUNT' as type,2 as statType, COUNT(1) as total,COALESCE((SELECT COUNT(1) from box_bill bill
  INNER JOIN sys_setmeal_type ml ON bill.SealTypeId = ml.SetNO
  WHERE ml.UserType = 2  and bill.OrderType = 1 and UpLoadFlag = 1),0) as success 
  from box_bill frt INNER JOIN sys_setmeal_type meal ON frt.SealTypeId = meal.SetNO
  WHERE meal.UserType = 2 and frt.OrderType = 1
-- 交易记录：临时车,线下--现金(全量)
	UNION
	SELECT 'TEMP_OFFLINE_CASH_AMOUNT' as type,2 as statType, COUNT(1) as total,COALESCE((SELECT COUNT(1) from box_bill bill
  INNER JOIN sys_setmeal_type ml ON bill.SealTypeId = ml.SetNO
  WHERE ml.UserType = 2  and bill.PayTypeID =13  and bill.OrderType in (2,3,4)  and UpLoadFlag = 1 ),0) as success 
  from box_bill frt INNER JOIN sys_setmeal_type meal ON frt.SealTypeId = meal.SetNO
  WHERE meal.UserType = 2  and frt.PayTypeID =13 and frt.OrderType in (2,3,4)
-- 交易记录：临时车,线下--其他(全量)
	UNION
	SELECT 'TEMP_OFFLINE_OTHER_AMOUNT' as type,2 as statType, COUNT(1) as total,COALESCE((SELECT COUNT(1) from box_bill bill
  INNER JOIN sys_setmeal_type ml ON bill.SealTypeId = ml.SetNO
  WHERE ml.UserType = 2  and bill.PayTypeID !=13 and bill.OrderType in (2,3,4) and UpLoadFlag = 1 ),0) as success 
  from box_bill frt INNER JOIN sys_setmeal_type meal ON frt.SealTypeId = meal.SetNO
  WHERE meal.UserType = 2 and frt.PayTypeID !=13 and frt.OrderType in (2,3,4)

) temp;

END

sp_billStatistic
procedureList.CreateString:
CREATE DEFINER=`jieLink`@`%` PROCEDURE `sp_billStatistic`(`beginTime` varchar(36),`endTime` varchar(36))
BEGIN 

	select @freeMoney := sum(AccountReceivable) from box_bill where ChargeType=2 and PayTime>=beginTime and PayTime<endTime;
	
	#打折金额:应收大于0，且不等于实收，使用商家优惠（最高收费已满或异常放行除外）
	select @discountMoney := sum(AccountReceivable) from box_bill
			where AccountReceivable>0 and AccountReceivable>ActualPaid and ChargeType<>3 and PayTime>=beginTime and PayTime<endTime;

	#未打折金额，应收大于0，且等于实收
	select @notDiscountMoney := sum(AccountReceivable) from box_bill
			where AccountReceivable>0 and AccountReceivable=ActualPaid and PayTime>=beginTime and PayTime<endTime;

	#异常放行金额=手动开闸（事件6）+软件开闸放行（‘非机动车放行’，‘特权车放行’，‘识别失败放行’，‘临时访客放行’，‘预约访客放行’）
	#+收费已满放行
  select @abnormalMoney := sum(AccountReceivable) from box_bill
			where PayTime>=beginTime and PayTime<endTime
			and ( EventType=6 or EventType=5 or EventType=14 or EventType=16 or EventType=18 or ChargeType=3 );

END

	FROM

	WHERE
		type = mytype ;
	END

CREATE DEFINER=`jieLink`@`%` PROCEDURE `SP_GeneratePlateNo`()
BEGIN 
DECLARE plateNo VARCHAR(10);
DECLARE platePrefix VARCHAR(10);
DECLARE prefix VARCHAR(10);
DECLARE newPlateNo VARCHAR(20);
set platePrefix = (SELECT valueText from sys_key_value_setting where KeyID='DefaultPlatePrefix' limit 1);

		WHEN

(select(

			(65+ceiling(rand()*25)) > 73 AND (65+ceiling(rand()*25)) < 79

(select(

			(65+ceiling(rand()*25)) > 73 AND (65+ceiling(rand()*25)) < 79
			THEN char(73+abs(ceiling(rand()*9)-4))
		ELSE
			char(79+ceiling(rand()*11))
		END))
			END)),(select(
	CASE
		WHEN
			 ceiling(rand()*25) % 2 = 0
			THEN ceiling(rand()*9)
			ELSE
(select(
 CASE
		WHEN
			(65+ceiling(rand()*25)) < 73
			THEN char(65+abs(ceiling(rand()*9)-2))
		WHEN
			(65+ceiling(rand()*25)) > 73 AND (65+ceiling(rand()*25)) < 79
			THEN char(73+abs(ceiling(rand()*9)-4))
		ELSE
			char(79+ceiling(rand()*11))
		END))
			END))));
set newPlateNo = REPLACE(concat('无',prefix,plateNo),'I','1');
SELECT newPlateNo;
 END

procedureList.Name: SP_GetCheckData
procedureList.CreateString:
CREATE DEFINER=`jieLink`@`%` PROCEDURE `SP_GetCheckData`(
in CheckDate Date
)
BEGIN
set @CheckDate := CheckDate;


 SELECT COUNT(1) INTO @totalParkOutNum
    FROM    box_out_record  
    WHERE   OutDeviceID > 0
            AND OutTime >= @CheckDate
            AND OutTime < DATE_ADD(DATE(@CheckDate),INTERVAL 1 DAY);

SELECT SUM(AccountReceivable) INTO @totalParkOutCharge
FROM box_out_record
WHERE  OutDeviceID > 0
            AND OutTime >= @CheckDate
            AND OutTime < DATE_ADD(DATE(@CheckDate),INTERVAL 1 DAY);

 SELECT  COUNT(1) INTO @parkOutNum
    FROM   box_out_record
    WHERE    OutDeviceID > 0
            AND UpLoadFlag = 1
             AND OutTime >= @CheckDate
             AND OutTime < DATE_ADD(DATE(@CheckDate),INTERVAL 1 DAY);

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(AccountReceivable),0) INTO @parkOutCharge
FROM box_out_record
WHERE  OutDeviceID > 0
            AND UpLoadFlag = 1
            AND OutTime >= @CheckDate 
            AND OutTime < DATE_ADD(DATE(@CheckDate),INTERVAL 1 DAY);
            
    SELECT COUNT(1) INTO @totalHandWorkNum
    FROM    box_out_record
    WHERE   OutDeviceID > 0
            AND EventType = 6
            AND OutTime >= @CheckDate
            AND OutTime < DATE_ADD(DATE(@CheckDate),INTERVAL 1 DAY);
                    
    SELECT COUNT(1) INTO @parkOutHandWorkNum
    FROM    box_out_record
    WHERE   OutDeviceID > 0
            AND UpLoadFlag = 1
            AND EventType = 6
             AND OutTime >= @CheckDate
             AND OutTime < DATE_ADD(DATE(@CheckDate),INTERVAL 1 DAY);


    SELECT   COUNT(1) INTO @totalCardIssueNum
    FROM    control_voucher
    WHERE   AddTime >= @CheckDate
            AND AddTime < DATE_ADD(DATE(@CheckDate),INTERVAL 1 DAY);
    SET @cardIssueNum=@totalCardIssueNum;

select  CheckDate,@totalParkOutNum as totalParkOutNum
      ,@totalParkOutCharge as totalParkOutCharge
      ,@parkOutNum as parkOutNum
      ,@parkOutCharge as parkOutCharge
      ,@totalHandWorkNum as totalHandWorkNum,@parkOutHandWorkNum as parkOutHandWorkNum
      ,@totalCardIssueNum as totalCardIssueNum,@cardIssueNum as cardIssueNum,1 as isPicture;           
 END

procedureList.Name: SP_UploadDataMonitor
procedureList.CreateString:
CREATE DEFINER=`jieLink`@`%` PROCEDURE `SP_UploadDataMonitor`(
in CheckDate DATE
)
BEGIN
set @CheckDate := CheckDate;
SELECT type,statType,total,success from (
-- 设备(全量)
  SELECT 'DEVICE' as type,2 as statType, COUNT(1) as total,COALESCE((SELECT count(DISTINCT BusinessId) from sync_park_base_history ht 
  WHERE ht.BusinessId  in (SELECT DGUID from control_devices  fr 
  INNER JOIN dic_detail dic on fr.DeviceType = dic.DicDetailId
  WHERE dic.NisspCode != '' and dic.DicTypeId =1000 and dic.NisspCode != '8888' and dic.NisspCode != '9999') and ServiceId='dm_equip_base_data_equipment'),0) as success from control_devices frt 
  INNER JOIN dic_detail dic on frt.DeviceType = dic.DicDetailId
  WHERE dic.NisspCode != '' and dic.DicTypeId =1000 and dic.NisspCode != '8888' and dic.NisspCode != '9999'
-- 人员(全量) 
	UNION
	SELECT 'PERSON' as type,2 as statType, COUNT(1) as total,COALESCE((SELECT count(DISTINCT BusinessId) from sync_park_base_history ht 
  WHERE ht.BusinessId in (SELECT PGUID from control_person where `Status` != 1) and ServiceId='dm_base_data_person'),0) as success from control_person frt 
  WHERE frt.`Status` != 1
-- 凭证（正常）(全量)
	UNION
	SELECT 'CARD_NORMAL' as type,2 as statType, COUNT(1) as total,COALESCE((SELECT count(DISTINCT BusinessId) from sync_park_base_history ht 
  WHERE ht.BusinessId in (SELECT Guid from control_voucher where `Status` = 1) and ServiceId='dm_card_voucherInfo'),0) as success from control_voucher frt
  WHERE frt.`Status` = 1
-- 服务（正常）(全量)
	UNION
	SELECT 'SERVICE_NORMAL' as type,2 as statType, COUNT(1) as total,COALESCE((SELECT count(DISTINCT BusinessId) from sync_park_base_history ht 
  WHERE ht.BusinessId in (SELECT NisspId from control_lease_stall where `Status` = 0)  and ServiceId='dm_card_data_serviceInfo'),0) as success 
  from control_lease_stall frt  WHERE frt.`Status` = 0
-- 人员设备关系(全量)
	UNION
	SELECT 'PERSON_DEVICE' as type,2 as statType, COUNT(1) as total,COALESCE((SELECT count(DISTINCT BusinessId) from sync_park_base_history ht 
  WHERE ht.BusinessId in (SELECT PDGUID from control_person_device) and ServiceId='dm_base_data_personpermission'),0) as success from control_person_device frt
-- 人员防区关系(全量)
	UNION
	SELECT 'PERSON_AREA' as type,2 as statType, COUNT(1) as total,COALESCE((SELECT count(DISTINCT BusinessId) from sync_park_base_history ht 
  WHERE ht.BusinessId in (SELECT PAGUID from control_person_area) and ServiceId='dm_base_data_personarea'),0) as success from control_person_area frt
-- 车辆信息(全量)
	UNION
	SELECT 'CAR' as type,2 as statType, COUNT(1) as total,COALESCE((SELECT count(DISTINCT BusinessId) from sync_park_base_history ht 
  WHERE ht.BusinessId in (SELECT VGUID from control_vehicle_info where `Status` != 2) and ServiceId='dm_park_base_data_car'),0) as success 
  from control_vehicle_info frt where frt.`Status` != 2
-- 临时卡收费标准(全量)
	UNION
	SELECT 'TEMP_CARD_STANDARD' as type,2 as statType, COUNT(1) as total,COALESCE((SELECT count(DISTINCT BusinessId) from sync_park_base_history ht 
  WHERE ht.BusinessId in (SELECT TGUID from charge_temp_standard where `Status` = 1) and ServiceId='dm_park_base_data_tempcardstandard'),0) as success 
  from charge_temp_standard frt where frt.`Status` = 1
-- 月卡收费标准(全量)
	UNION
	SELECT 'MONTH_CARD_STANDARD' as type,2 as statType, COUNT(1) as total,COALESCE((SELECT count(DISTINCT BusinessId) from sync_park_base_history ht 
  WHERE ht.BusinessId in (SELECT MGUID from finance_month_charge where `Status` = 0 and MonthNum >0 and MonthMoney > 0) and ServiceId='dm_park_base_data_monthcardstandard'),0) as success 
  from finance_month_charge frt where frt.`Status` = 0 and MonthNum >0 and MonthMoney > 0
-- 场内车辆(全量)
	UNION
	SELECT 'YARD_CAR' as type,2 as statType, COUNT(1) as total, COUNT(1) as success from box_enter_record frt
  where frt.WasGone = 0
-- 入场数据(增量)
	UNION
	SELECT 'IN_RECORD' as type,1 as statType, COUNT(1) as total,COALESCE((SELECT COUNT(EGUID) from box_enter_record where EnterTime >= @CheckDate 
  AND EnterTime < DATE_ADD(DATE(@CheckDate),INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND UpLoadFlag = 1),0) as success from box_enter_record frt
  where frt.EnterTime >= @CheckDate AND frt.EnterTime < DATE_ADD(DATE(@CheckDate),INTERVAL 1 DAY)
  -- 出场数据(增量)
	UNION
	SELECT 'OUT_RECORD' as type,1 as statType, COUNT(1) as total,COALESCE((SELECT COUNT(OGUID) from box_out_record 
  where OutTime >= @CheckDate AND OutTime < DATE_ADD(DATE(@CheckDate),INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND UpLoadFlag = 1),0) as success from box_out_record frt
  where frt.OutTime >= @CheckDate AND frt.OutTime < DATE_ADD(DATE(@CheckDate),INTERVAL 1 DAY)
-- 消费打折(增量)
	UNION
	SELECT 'DISCOUNT' as type,1 as statType, COUNT(1) as total,COALESCE((SELECT count(DISTINCT BusinessId) from sync_xmpp_history ht 
  WHERE ht.BusinessId in (SELECT NisspId from business_discount where `Way` = 0 AND DiscountTime >= @CheckDate AND DiscountTime < DATE_ADD(DATE(@CheckDate),INTERVAL 1 DAY)) 
  AND ServiceId='dm_park_discountNotify'),0) as success 
  from business_discount frt where frt.`Way` = 0 AND frt.DiscountTime >= @CheckDate AND frt.DiscountTime < DATE_ADD(DATE(@CheckDate),INTERVAL 1 DAY)
-- 车场黑名单(全量)
	UNION
	SELECT 'CAR_BLACK_SHEET' as type,2 as statType, COUNT(1) as total,COALESCE((SELECT count(DISTINCT BusinessId) from sync_park_base_history ht 
  WHERE ht.BusinessId in (SELECT BGUID from black_white_grey where `Status` = 0) and ServiceId='dm_park_base_data_carblacksheet'),0) as success 
  from black_white_grey frt where frt.`Status` = 0
-- 图片数据(增量)
	UNION
	SELECT 'PICTURE' as type,1 as statType, COUNT(1) as total,COUNT(1) as success from sync_xmpp_history 
  where ServiceId = 'dm_common_file_image' AND ServiceType = 0 AND AddTime >= @CheckDate AND AddTime < DATE_ADD(DATE(@CheckDate),INTERVAL 1 DAY)
-- 卡券打折记录(增量)
	UNION
	SELECT 'TICKET_RECORD' as type,1 as statType, COUNT(1) as total,COUNT(1) as success 
  from business_discount frt where frt.`Way` = 1 AND frt.DiscountTime >= @CheckDate AND frt.DiscountTime < DATE_ADD(DATE(@CheckDate),INTERVAL 1 DAY)
-- 未解锁车辆出场记录(全量)
	UNION
	SELECT 'UNLOCK_CAR_OUT' as type,2 as statType, COUNT(1) as total,COUNT(1) as success  from control_plate_lock frt where frt.`LockStatus` = 1 
-- 交易记录：月租车,线上--支付(全量)
	UNION
	SELECT 'MONTH_ONLINE_AMOUNT' as type,2 as statType, COUNT(1) as total,COALESCE((SELECT COUNT(1) from box_bill bill
  INNER JOIN sys_setmeal_type ml ON bill.SealTypeId = ml.SetNO
  WHERE ml.UserType = 1  and bill.OrderType = 1 and UpLoadFlag = 1),0) as success 
  from box_bill frt INNER JOIN sys_setmeal_type meal ON frt.SealTypeId = meal.SetNO
  WHERE meal.UserType = 1 and frt.OrderType = 1
-- 交易记录：月租车,线下--现金(全量)
	UNION
	SELECT 'MONTH_CASH_AMOUNT' as type,2 as statType, COUNT(1) as total,COALESCE((SELECT COUNT(1) from box_bill bill
  INNER JOIN sys_setmeal_type ml ON bill.SealTypeId = ml.SetNO
  WHERE ml.UserType = 1  and bill.PayTypeID =13 and bill.OrderType in (2,3,4) and UpLoadFlag = 1),0) as success 
  from box_bill frt INNER JOIN sys_setmeal_type meal ON frt.SealTypeId = meal.SetNO
  WHERE meal.UserType = 1 and frt.PayTypeID =13 and frt.OrderType in (2,3,4)
-- 交易记录：临时车,线上--代扣(全量)
	UNION
	SELECT 'TEMP_ONLINE_WITHHOLD_AMOUNT' as type,2 as statType, COUNT(1) as total,COALESCE((SELECT COUNT(1) from box_bill bill
  INNER JOIN sys_setmeal_type ml ON bill.SealTypeId = ml.SetNO
  WHERE ml.UserType = 2 and bill.ReplaceDeduct = 1 and UpLoadFlag = 1),0) as success 
  from box_bill frt INNER JOIN sys_setmeal_type meal ON frt.SealTypeId = meal.SetNO
  WHERE meal.UserType = 2 and frt.ReplaceDeduct = 1
-- 交易记录：临时车,线上--主动付(全量)
	UNION
	SELECT 'TEMP_ONLINE_INITIATIVE_AMOUNT' as type,2 as statType, COUNT(1) as total,COALESCE((SELECT COUNT(1) from box_bill bill
  INNER JOIN sys_setmeal_type ml ON bill.SealTypeId = ml.SetNO
  WHERE ml.UserType = 2  and bill.OrderType = 1 and UpLoadFlag = 1),0) as success 
  from box_bill frt INNER JOIN sys_setmeal_type meal ON frt.SealTypeId = meal.SetNO
  WHERE meal.UserType = 2 and frt.OrderType = 1
-- 交易记录：临时车,线下--现金(全量)
	UNION
	SELECT 'TEMP_OFFLINE_CASH_AMOUNT' as type,2 as statType, COUNT(1) as total,COALESCE((SELECT COUNT(1) from box_bill bill
  INNER JOIN sys_setmeal_type ml ON bill.SealTypeId = ml.SetNO
  WHERE ml.UserType = 2  and bill.PayTypeID =13  and bill.OrderType in (2,3,4)  and UpLoadFlag = 1 ),0) as success 
  from box_bill frt INNER JOIN sys_setmeal_type meal ON frt.SealTypeId = meal.SetNO
  WHERE meal.UserType = 2  and frt.PayTypeID =13 and frt.OrderType in (2,3,4)
-- 交易记录：临时车,线下--其他(全量)
	UNION
	SELECT 'TEMP_OFFLINE_OTHER_AMOUNT' as type,2 as statType, COUNT(1) as total,COALESCE((SELECT COUNT(1) from box_bill bill
  INNER JOIN sys_setmeal_type ml ON bill.SealTypeId = ml.SetNO
  WHERE ml.UserType = 2  and bill.PayTypeID !=13 and bill.OrderType in (2,3,4) and UpLoadFlag = 1 ),0) as success 
  from box_bill frt INNER JOIN sys_setmeal_type meal ON frt.SealTypeId = meal.SetNO
  WHERE meal.UserType = 2 and frt.PayTypeID !=13 and frt.OrderType in (2,3,4)

) temp;

END

procedureList.Name: sp_VehicleFlow
update_monitor
